mapper.insert: insert into qna values( qna_seq.nextval, #{qnaWriter}, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaContent}, sysdate, null, null )
mapper.select: select qna_no as qnaNo, qna_writer as qnaWriter, qna_title as qnaTitle, qna_content as qnaContent, ask_date as askDate, qna_answer as qnaAnswer, answer_date as answerDate from qna where qna_writer = #{_param} order by qna_no desc
